ygData.subject: RE: Another Question (I know odd)...
ygData.msgSnippet: Doh.. Ok I mis-read it.. these are changes on test still.. Anyway questions still stand though.. (Guess I still have to wait a few hours to see what goes
ygData.messageBody:
Doh.. Ok I mis-read it.. these are changes on test still.. Anyway questions
still stand though..

(Guess I still have to wait a few hours to see what goes live...)



-----Original Message-----
From: Wilson, ThomasX B [mailto:thomasx.b.wilson@...]
Sent: Thursday, October 28, 1999 7:56 AM
To: 'shadowknight@onelist.com'
Subject: [shadowknight] Another Question (I know odd)...


From: "Wilson, ThomasX B" <thomasx.b.wilson@...>

Looks like they made the Lifetaps live for all those that care, now I'm
curious. Since I own the spells they are replacing will the lifetaps already
be in my spell book? This is mainly out of curiosity since I won't be able
to play for another 10 hrs or so..

Oh and if you noticed they made two other changes that effect SK's. First
they added +4 to our Poison/Disease resistance (Always nice to get something
you didn't ask for), and it looks like they reduced the casting time and
mana cost of Invoke Fear..

One more thing while I'm thinking about spells, why do they give us
Ultravision at lvl 49 when they we have Deadeye at 22? Is ultravision that
much better, or am I just missing something being a DE?

Well that should do it for now.. Oh and it looks like they itemized Kedge
keep (I knew that Fish Bone earring would come in handy someday)..

Enjoy

Thomas

-= Support Evil Roleplaying =-
